txt.en: Tower of Orthanc: Ring of Lightning -- Tier 1

The Free Peoples often believe trolls to be drooling, unthinking monsters -- and often they are correct -- but it is not the rule. Some of the Enemy's greatest and most intelligent leaders are trolls, and Saruman has acquired one of these for himself. To this beast, he has given a ring which imbues upon him the power of the storm....

You have claimed the Ring of Lightning
